keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Yvette Teixeira, 43, had grappled with poverty for years. But the sudden death of one of her daughters made some everyday struggles even more painful.

headline.print_headline: After a Daughter’s Death, Mustering the Strength to Raise Three More
headline.main: After Losing a Daughter, Mustering Strength for 3 Who Remain

snippet: Yvette Teixeira, 43, had grappled with poverty for years. But the sudden death of one of her daughters made some everyday struggles even more painful.
abstract: Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provides single mother Yvette Teixeira of Manhattan with money to purchase school uniforms for her three daughters.
